Terms of Service

This website is operated by Performante.ca. Throughout the site, the terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to Performante.ca. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to the website following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.

SECTION 22 - GIVEAWAY TERMS AND CONDITIONS

For the purposes of these Terms and Conditions, "The Promoter" refers to Performante whose Instagram handle is @Performante.ca. The "Prize" refers to PCC – Performante Community Coin, our social token (or whatever is depicted in the social media post promoting said giveaway).
